title: Public Speaking Assessment
description: Rate your communication and presentation skills honestly

questions.question: How comfortable are you speaking in front of a group of 20+ people?

options.label: Very uncomfortable - I avoid it at all costs
Uncomfortable - I get very nervous
Neutral - I can do it but prefer not to
Comfortable - I enjoy speaking to groups
Very comfortable - I seek out speaking opportunities

questions.question: How often do you volunteer to present or speak in class, meetings, or events?

options.label: Never - I actively avoid it
Rarely - Only when required
Sometimes - When I feel confident about the topic
Often - I'm usually willing to volunteer
Always - I frequently raise my hand first

questions.question: How well can you organize your thoughts and speak clearly under pressure?

options.label: Poorly - I freeze or ramble incoherently
Below average - I struggle to stay organized
Average - I can manage with some preparation
Good - I stay fairly organized even under stress
Excellent - I thrive under pressure and speak clearly

questions.question: How confident are you in your ability to engage and persuade an audience?

options.label: Not confident - I can't hold attention
Slightly confident - I struggle to engage listeners
Moderately confident - I can keep attention with effort
Confident - I can usually engage my audience well
Very confident - I consistently captivate audiences

questions.question: How do you handle feedback or questions after a presentation?

options.label: Poorly - I get defensive or flustered
Below average - I struggle to respond clearly
Average - I can handle basic questions
Good - I welcome and address feedback effectively
Excellent - I encourage dialogue and handle tough questions
